data.message: Can you guys please delete my frequency vibrations page for good I do not agree with forcing people to download messenger or use their government name I can go back to MySpace for that and since fb has no way to contact customer service this is what you get

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you feel that way, Kendrick. You can learn how to delete your Page here: http://bit.ly/1UfrY82. You can also let us know how we could make your experience more enjoyable at: http://bit.ly/1Ufrhvq. -Jordan
Thanks I can't get into that page cause it wants me upload my I.d. which I'm not
